GSA-OA is a Resin Impregnated Paper (RIP) bushing with Silicone Rubber (SiR) insulator oil-air applications. The condenser core is bonded directly to the silicone rubber to give a compact and lightweight bushing containing no gas, oil, or other liquids. The GSA bushing can be installed at any angle from horizontal to vertical and is equipped with a 2 kV test tap. Conductor arrangement can be either of draw lead or solid rod type.​
